website_summaries.verdict: A great value towel bar you can fit into virtually any space in the bathroom. Small and narrow allows it to fit into nooks and crannies with ease.
pros: Heavy-duty fasteners keep the bar secured to the wall when in use
Metallic finish makes it easy to clean if necessary
cons: Lacks the space of much larger towel racks

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, but look nice!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an alternative to paying two or three times as much for a Kohler Kelston collection towel bar. It's not identical, but it's across the bathroom from the Kohler fixtures, and looks enough alike that any difference is not noticeable. This arrived super-quickly, and with the nice paper template for marking where to screw everything in, it was easy to install. My only complaint is that the bar fits a little loosely into into the wall anchors, so it jingles and rotates when you put a towel onto it. Pretty minor.
customer_reviews.author: S. Mcwalters

customer_reviews.title: Not Good Product
customer_reviews.text: This produce just feels cheap. I removed my old ones that were 20 years old and they were much better quality. The mounting holes on the old one a horizontal screw pattern, but these new ones have a vertical pattern. So I had to drill new holes only to find out the anchors that are provided, did not work with drywall. A trip to HD and I had good drywall anchors. After I installed the bar, I noticed the bar was loose and would rattle. A little Loctite fixed that problem. Bottom line is that I would not buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Jake the Snake

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful looking towel rack
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful looking towel rack! Came with an instruction manual, a pre-measured out installation guide and a set of screws and anchors, I strongly recommend that you have a level, a shopvac, a drill, a pencil and some patience. I loved how this ended up looking in my bathroom! Thank you Moen for a great quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Andy F.

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars if the rod was a little more stout.
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly good towel bar for the money. The bar itself seems a little flimsy but unless someone really reefs on it it should be fine. Do yourself a favor and take the wall anchors that come with the unit and take them straight to the trash. I wouldn't have so much as a picture with those. In my case where I had no stud on either end of the bar, I determined that Toggle bolts in my opinion is the only real strong way to hang a towel bar.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Very nice towel bar
customer_reviews.text: I have multiple bath towels to hang in the boys bathroom. Hanging them on a peg or hook only leaves them not drying completely. This towel rack is a nice length to lay the towels out flat allowing them to dry faster and more completely. I can't comment on the ease of installation, except only to say that as my husband was putting them up I didn't hear him fussing so I'd say that's a good sign that they were easy to install. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: In general they're nice towel bars
customer_reviews.text: Bought two. In general they're nice towel bars, but the finish of the bar doesn't match the finish on the support pieces. The bar has a more brownish tint to it whereas the supports are more to the stainless/brushed nickel look we actually wanted. Can't understand why they wouldn't match exactly. A bit disappointing, but hey, they're only towel bars and they will serve that function quite well. If my wife really notices the difference and doesn't like them, back they go! Update: Contacted Moen, who will very kindly be sending replacements. Rating will be 5 Stars if replacements are expected brushed nickel finish.
customer_reviews.author: R. Kloos

customer_reviews.title: Sturdiness is a concern
customer_reviews.text: The installation was quick and easy, but the template leaves enough play for the bar to roll when the towel is pulled. I don't know if it was intended to do that but I would have preferred that the bar be more secure and not roll with the towel. The noise of the towel bar rolling is quite noticeable. Otherwise, the towel bar hold a thick towel even when slightly damp.
customer_reviews.author: NewKindleFire

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It’s as described. Delivery was fast and the next day. Item is of good quality. Easy to install. I realized that I love brush nickel and bought the whole bathroom set. Good for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Malissa F

customer_reviews.title: works as expected.
customer_reviews.text: The wife and I went to the big box stores looking for things to finish our bath remodel. We say all the moen products and decided we liked them,but did not like the price.So I decided to wait and see if it was less on here and low and behold it was. I bought it with out a concern and it came quick as I have prime. The rod and holder is plastic but seems to hold up fine.trust me my kit dropped it out the door{don't ask] and well no flaking or chipping. Just a word of caution fin a stud,as the wall anchors do not always last.
customer_reviews.author: Multiple user

customer_reviews.title: Nice towel rack for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking towel rack. They are so light I thought they were plastic, but they are actually metal. The included mounting brackets are sturdy for the purpose. The actual rack tube is very thin, like sturdy aluminum foil thickness. They dent easily if accidentally struck by a hard object, but naturally towels and fingers will not cause dents.
customer_reviews.author: ja

customer_reviews.title: Very nice towel rack.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice and elegant towel rack. I can easily hang one large bath towel and that is what I needed. Install took about five minutes with a power drill and screwdriver. Plastic anchors are included but you will need a small flat head screwdriver to mount the brackets. Overall, fit and finish is decent and looks clean. I liked it so I ordered two more sets.
customer_reviews.author: Max™

customer_reviews.title: Attractive Bathroom Hardware
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these towel bars to complete my bathroom setup. I found them quick and easy to install. The directions were clear and easy to follow, step 1,step 2,etc. All the needed screws and anchors were included. The only things I needed were a level and a screwdriver. It also helped to find a small screwdriver to tighten the set screw. The result is a secure towel bar to display my new bath towels. I found this a good product to buy at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia S

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected..:
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! Looks 1000% better than what the previous owners had up. Bought 1 for both bathrooms upstairs. Just installed last night but so far, sturdy enough to hold 2 large towels so fingers crossed! Ordered a 3rd today for my 1/2 bath. Only thing they could throw in would be a tiny screwdriver for the bottom screws. They do include in other products so that would be nice. The longest part of the install was trying to unscrew/screw these in! The whole 'project' took 10 minutes tops tho.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Elegance
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Moen 24" brushed nickel finished bathroom towel rod expecting it to be as flimsy , and difficult to install as every other towel rod I looked at. I was amazed, and surprised to find that it is well made, sturdy, including the enclosed brackets, well coated finish, and easy to install. Thank you Moen for making my day.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline

customer_reviews.title: nice looking but the bar is VERY THIN
customer_reviews.text: I feel the bar is too thin for anything except hanging your towel... YES that is what it is for BUT with kids or if you happen to grab it for some reason it pulls right out of the ends and bends........ I learned and now I put a 3/8" dowel through it and that stiffens it very well. have not had an issue after that.
customer_reviews.author: G.P.WI

customer_reviews.title: Moen towel bar
customer_reviews.text: This was fairly easy to put up. The instructions come with life size design, in order to mark your placement and holes correctly. Put it it a couple months ago, and it hasn’t loosened any. The only thing I didn’t use was the dry wall anchors it came with. I used a different set that I had left over from putting up the closet racks.
customer_reviews.author: Maria CP

customer_reviews.title: Major Design Flaw
customer_reviews.text: The bar holding the towel rotates freely in the end caps. I have 2 small towels hanging on it, and when I pull one of the towels off, the bar spins and the other towel falls on the floor. Yeah, the bar looks pretty, but it's poorly designed.
customer_reviews.author: Animal Lover

customer_reviews.title: Instructions are not great, but the bar itself is wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this towel bar to match the others in my bathroom of my new house, and luckily it was a perfect match! Instructions were pretty horrible for someone who has never installed a towel bar before, I had no idea what to do with the parts. With a little outside guidance, and using the included wall template and a level, we managed to install the bar within 5 minutes and it looks great. We drilled the screws into the wall and it seems very sturdy. The bar does twist, like most towel bars do, which is a flaw I wish could be fixed but that's just the way most towel bars are. Overall, I'm very happy for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica W.

customer_reviews.title: Buy your own screws
customer_reviews.text: Provided screws are terrible and strip easily. If you screw into a wood, your screw driver will strip the head of the screw. Also the plastic screw mount thing where you suppose to push into hollow walls breaks easily. Suggest you buy your own screws. Other than that, it looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: To be or Not To Be

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Good price, nice product. This is much better quality then the cheap ones you can find a the big stores. It is still an entry level product, but will work great for my application. I was a little disappointed in the shipping. With prime it was supposed to arrive in two days, but for whatever reasons after I placed the order it stated a delivery date that was three days. When it finally showed up a my door it was four days. Not that big of a deal.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice look
customer_reviews.text: These rods looks great. Never a fan of installing the Moen brand of bathroom hardware, but over all it is good quality. The Anchorage that come with it are very weak. Instead I always use the metal screw in anchors for the strongest hold.
customer_reviews.author: CdnMum

customer_reviews.title: ... hardware store and found that Amazon was a much better price.
customer_reviews.text: Priced out this towel bar and other accessories in the Moen line at a local big box hardware store and found that Amazon was a much better price... not shocking one bit! The simple and classic design matched our existing cabinet knobs and wasn't nearly as fussy as the other bathroom hardware available by major manufacturers Really like the brushed nickel finish, but wish that the bar had been a slightly heftier weight. It feels lightweight and a bit on the cheap side. But I guess you get what you pay for! Installation was VERY easy and took no longer than several minutes. Recommend these items for a cost effective way to update any bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and cute
customer_reviews.text: Really cute. My bf installed in minutes. Fit well in my white/gray theme bathroom. Pretty sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: lilylu7

customer_reviews.title: Great towel bar
customer_reviews.text: Used this to replace an older ceramic towel bar. Installation was easy. But if you are planning to use this towel bar daily I would highly recommend getting better mounting hardware or making sure you hit atleast one stud.
customer_reviews.author: TBurk

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: Not the greatest but it works and I’m keeping them. It helps to place a cotton ball on either side so the bar doesn’t slide left and right or in circles. If you don’t, it will be loud every time you take towel off.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Freely Spinning Bar
customer_reviews.text: Looks great for the price! Easy to follow instructions and installation took about 15-20 minutes. My issue is the bar between each arm spins freely. I don't know if this is the standard design, but I have never had a towel rack where the bar spun freely. I re-read the instructions to ensure I didn't miss a step, but there was not a step that involved preventing the bar from spinning. Other than my complaint at the spinning the bar has held up well since installation about 4 months ago. Chrome still looks like new!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Unintuitive, does not contain proper hardware for installation, and shorter than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Ithea

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended, Excellent Fit and Finish
customer_reviews.text: Towel bar...what could you say about it? Well, it is excellent in fit and finish, sturdy, easy to install. I have purchased a few of these in different sizes to mount to wood doors as well as sheetrock walls. Installation is quick and simple, comes with all hardware necessary. I was replacing older towel bars in a recent remodel, using the previous mounting holes - in this case you may need to use a different wall anchor type or size as the previous hole from the other replaced one may be a bit large and not hold the mounting hardware snug. I would recommend, and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: BigdoginTexas

customer_reviews.title: moen shower bar, is ok
customer_reviews.text: good for my rentel, the end pieces seem sturdy but the bar/tube is so thin and cheap i dont even know how they got a layer of chrome on it, its that thin feels like plastic... not a heavy solid chrome piece
customer_reviews.author: pat

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful line of accessories
customer_reviews.text: I searched and searched for find what would be perfect for our redecorating project. I found Moen "Preston" - my decorator said I'd be happy and I was!! We purchased the hook, 2 towel rings (which don't protrude too much from wall) 3 towel bars and the toilet paper holder that makes it so easy to slip the new roll right on. I really love the appearance of all these pieces and the brushed nickel gives an updated look I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Janner

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a builder grade towel bar that was incorrectly installed and falling out of the wall. This did require drilling and mounting with a wall anchor. I am very pleased, it seems very sturdy and looks beautiful, Now, I just need to replace everything else in my bathroom with brushed nickel to match!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney W.

customer_reviews.title: Like the product, but has Manufacture Defect...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a Moen collection that did not work out, so replaced it with the Moen Preston Collection (towel bar and two other items). The first towel bar came with a very noticeable DENT. Ordered a replacement, and the second one also has a dent, but not as noticeable. The bar itself feels solid enough, and fits the holding brackets well (snug). I have till mid July to return for a full refund, so will see if I can live with the minor dent. Obviously, this is a Moen issue and not Amazon's.
customer_reviews.author: PKO

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice & easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I am writing this a few months after I installed it, so I can't recall the details, but so far, it's holding really well. It's decent quality, looks nice, easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Pete the Cat

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and much more reasonable than other larger towel racks
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and much more reasonable than other larger towel racks. I hate layering towels - they never get dry - so I like to have both towels side by side.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Affordable towel bar but materials aren't the greatest...
customer_reviews.text: Good towel bar but I am a bit concerned about whether it will hold up in the long term. This is because the bar is made of inferior materials (read: cheap metal) and the mounts are made of even cheaper material (could be "metal" but it feels like plastic). Of course, I didn't expect high quality steel at this price point but I was surprised to find that it was that cheap. Despite this, I can only take one star off because of the fact that it was so affordable, which means I can't be surprised and/or penalize the product!
customer_reviews.author: N.K.

customer_reviews.title: Moen Quality.
customer_reviews.text: Good Moen Product.. don’t forget to turn the wall fasteners outward so the lock screw engages under the lip...
customer_reviews.author: James R. Bowen

customer_reviews.title: It's exactly as described. Came when promised.
customer_reviews.text: We have used this produce before in a previous home. So, when our new home had not a single towel rack, we ordered these, because we knew they were good.
customer_reviews.author: MariaMontgomery

customer_reviews.title: Great Towel Bar
customer_reviews.text: The towel bar is made well, the color is nice and it matches other Preston Inspirations products. Its a classy upgrade to my bathroom. Its wide enough for one full size bath towel to hang dry or two hand towels. So far I am very happy with my towel bar. Ive had it installed for a few months and so far it is sturdy looks as good as new. It installs quickly with drywall screws. Everything was included. It took me about 10 mins to install with a drill.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Meier

customer_reviews.title: Excellent in every way!
customer_reviews.text: I really like Moen products and this is one of them! I also bought some 18” ones but if you have enough space, the 24” ones are better value for your money!
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Strong, sleek, well made
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect. They felt well made and sturdy. The template was easy to install. We ended up using our own drywall anchors that provided more support. I would buy these again for a future home. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Mikals

customer_reviews.title: this looked exactly like the other fixtures in my apartment bathroom
customer_reviews.text: My apartment building didn't have a towel bar, so I needed to buy one online. Luckily for me, this looked exactly like the other fixtures in my apartment bathroom. This is a sturdy, easy to install product that looks good in any bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Max Ellithorpe

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Space saving :-D
customer_reviews.text: Buy it! You wont be disappointed! Sleak & stylish, Space saving for tight fitting bathrooms, and it has a great rust free coating on all pieces. Deff something that can hold up a while. Install is about 5mins with power tools or 10mins by hand. Hardware is good. Came with 2inch screws & mollies (x4each) and mounting plate (x2).
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and (mostly) easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I'm an apprentice do-it-yourselfer, amateur at everything yet master at nothing in the home improvement arena. This towel bar has a nice looking brushed nickel finish and holds two large bath towels folded in thirds. The installation instructions were easy to follow and, using the enclosed template and hardware, I had it put up and ready to hang towels on in under 15 minutes. I would have given it 5 stars if not for the most difficult part of installation; tightening the tiny screws on the underside of the mounting brackets, they are very close to the wall and it's difficult to maneuver a small screwdriver in such close quarters.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra David

customer_reviews.title: Installation is easier on a new wall
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful towel rack. The instructions were very clear - maybe if you were putting on a new wall. I am attempting to replace an old towel rack and the person who installed it did me no favors. There no wall left to install the mounting plates. The towel rack is currently on the floor waiting for me to figure out what to do!
customer_reviews.author: Leah F.

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Item as described. Very easy to install. Looks great! Comes with a paper template to determine where to drill holes. Just need to drill 4 holes total. Once your holes are in, you install the anchors. Place the mounting hardware over the anchors, and screw in the screws. From there, you just pop in the towel car, and tighten the tiny screws on the bottom of the round portions of the towel rod holder. Quick, easy, painless.
customer_reviews.author: scombro01

customer_reviews.title: Moen has fabulous reputation
customer_reviews.text: I have known Moen for years. The prices are exceptional. Fortunately mine was on sale....which is a good thing. Thank You for that....GAUPA
customer_reviews.author: Anne Pearl

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok to have it.
customer_reviews.text: It looks good,also the price is not bad. However, It’s not that strong as I expected looks like metal but if you touch it. It’s hard to match those of the bar. chrome covered plastic makes they are so light. Overall, it’s ok.
customer_reviews.author: Serena

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Instructions are easy to follow and I was able to hang this with very minimal help from my husband :) Took all of 10mins and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: eaprieto11

customer_reviews.title: Moen towel rod
customer_reviews.text: I am updating my bathroom and this was a perfect replacement for old towel rod. I love the style and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: L. Weeks

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly beautiful look.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased Moen to match the rest of the bathroom decor. Turned out very nice and as expected fror Moen, quality it high.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Norton

customer_reviews.title: perfect in my new bathroom!
customer_reviews.text: I got a 24" also. We used the same Template to hang the 18" rod and the Template was incorrect so we had to cut the rod about an inch, a little disappointing but it still looks nice. Just check the measurements on your template before you drill anything.
customer_reviews.author: Dab64

customer_reviews.title: Good look -  good price!
customer_reviews.text: This towel bar has an expensive look to it. It was easy to install, with very clear instructions and a helpful template included. I read the other reviews and placed a piece of tape over both ends of the bar before installing it into the end holders. This stopped any potential movement or spinning to the bar. I am very happy with this purchase. I bought the matching towel ring for a hand towel above the sink and am very happy with that too.
customer_reviews.author: LADesigner

customer_reviews.title: It looks nice
customer_reviews.text: However, I didn't measure the previous towel bar and just assumed it was 24", but it was actually 30". I didn't realize it until I was putting it up, so I couldn't return it. I noted that you could just buy a bar without the supports and thanks to reviewers, I knew I had to measure the diameter of the rod as well as the length. After an odyssey that included having to return the first bar because it was rather beat up, I got what I needed and my towel bar looks quite nice now. It's only been up a few days, but so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: rivo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful design and diameter of the towel bar makes it ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful design and diameter of the towel bar makes it look upscale and sturdy. Works perfect on my bathroom door. I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Ross I.

customer_reviews.title: Easy and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and looks great. I saw a lot of posts about it not staying on the wall and honestly I'm not sure what they are talking about. If installed correctly it seems to be very sturdy. The bar does spin inside the ends so I took the advice of one of the other reviewers and put a small piece of electrical tape on the ends where the bar goes inside the brackets and it took care of that problem :) We just remodeled our 1950s bathroom and so far all Moen merchandise that I have purchased has been wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Kbenedict89

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, but a few months after using this
customer_reviews.text: Good looking, but a few months after using this, one side of the rack kept falling off of the supports, no matter how tight I screwed in the screw, my towel would be on the floor. Realized that it was defectively made, the part of the piece that grips the support was slipping because it wasn't thick enough to latch on. Had to apply gorilla glue. Hope I don't have to ever take it down!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, but doesn't stay on the wall very well
customer_reviews.text: Not the best. It doesn't stay on the wall very well, if you bump it, it pops off the little metal mounts. I'm replacing it with something a little thicker and more substantial.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Good match - exactly what I'd been looking for
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. Had installed an 18" bar near the sink and wanted to replace the cheap 24" bars near the shower. For some reason, Delta no longer carries the line that I'd bought, but the Moen Preston looks the same!! Like the brushed nickel instead of shiny, I think it looks more upscale.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to install, looks great
customer_reviews.text: We hung these up nine-months ago, no issues. I would buy again. Very easy to install, looks like new all this time.
customer_reviews.author: J. Richard Behun

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be working...
customer_reviews.text: I recently updated my bathrooms with new hardware and plumbing fixtures in a brushed nickel finish. I compared the prices and quality of several different towel bars before deciding on this one. The quality of Moen products is usually commendable, and this item seems to be an example of that. The bar itself is metal, and the item seems to be heavy and durable. My husband had no problems installing the two items I ordered, so for those looking to install the towel bar themselves, this is an easy way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: It looks nice, is well built and the supplied template is ...
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice, is well built and the supplied template is easy to use but the supplied anchors are garbage. They are too easy to rip out. I highly recommend buying a pack of 50 lbs E-Z anchor twist-n-lock drywall anchors if a stud isn't in an optimal mounting location. Then all your mounts will feel solid. The 75lbs anchors are too big for how close together they are. If they provided good spiral type anchors I'd give it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: velocityg4

customer_reviews.title: Need a miny flathead screwdriver
customer_reviews.text: Installation is easy until you have to find the worlds tiniest flathead screwdriver to install the set screws. I would have rather paid an extra $5-10 and had the screwdriver included than get in my truck and go buy one from home depot. Using the edge of the scissors gets you started but not tight to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Czonkers

customer_reviews.title: Hangs a towel like nobodies business
customer_reviews.text: I can tell this isn't the sturdiest/thickest metal around but it works fine for a towel rack and keeps the weight down. Easy to install and matches the other "brushed metal" items in the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Schneid

customer_reviews.title: Not their best product
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several Moen products over the years, including towel bars, and have generally been pleased. I was disappointed to find this towel bar was made of a thinner metal and makes a squeaking sound when the center bar moves. This, of course, happens everytime you mess with the towel. I may try to wedge a piece of cardboard in between the rod and holder but I shouldn't have to. Bottom line: look for a different towel bar or a different Moen line. The box indicated this product was part of their "Preston" collection.
customer_reviews.author: A. Grow

customer_reviews.title: Very Light Duty
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Kohler 24" towel bar and a Barley toilet paper holder and the steel bar are very sturdy on both products. This Moen tower bar and other bathroom towel bars, rings, toilet paper holder, the bar/tubing wall is too thin, very light and can bend easily. I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: O Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and easy to install. Bought the matching toilet paper holder and the bathrooms look great now. Matched our brushed nickel fixtures nicely too.
customer_reviews.author: Norm

customer_reviews.title: super easy install
customer_reviews.text: super easy install. I really liked how it came with everything I need, including a outline that takes the guess work out of measuring. only con is the bar is not a tight fit and it moved around. Easy fix, all I did was put some electrical tape around the ends, just enough to make a tight fit.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Great price. Nice looking and easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Nice looking and easy to install. Wished that I had found these earlier.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine Findley

customer_reviews.title: Good size bar for hanging towels
customer_reviews.text: Had contractors installed these in our bathroom while they were renovating it. These can hand standard size bath towels without any issues. Does a good job and no complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: HF

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this product and the price is unbelievable!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product and the price is unbelievable. That’s what I loved about shopping on Amazon, always find good product that’s in reasonable (lower) price than elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: A good towel rack is all about how well you anchor ...
customer_reviews.text: A good towel rack is all about how well you anchor the thing. Make sure you hit at least one stud and use some beefy anchors for the other side. DO NOT USE the included plastic anchor nonsense that they always include with these things. Go to your hardware store and ask for a robust anchor! With my anchored securely to the wall, it has been working great, not a towel has fallen. SUCCESS!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Quality is good for the price. Make sure you measure the brackets to fit exactly with the bar other wise the bar will spin and make noise.
customer_reviews.author: QD

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. Good finish.
customer_reviews.text: The end pieces are nice and solid. It would be nice if the dowel material was thicker.
customer_reviews.author: stag808

customer_reviews.title: It works like all Moen products
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these and have been very satisfied. They look nice in our bathroom. We like to brushed pewter look. They are sturdy and well built. I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Rob S.

customer_reviews.title: high quality
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion this is over priced, but it's very good quality. We got it to match our other fixtures which were the same maker/style . If you want a more high end product and don't mind paying extra for it, this is a good option.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Great, Sturdy Product
customer_reviews.text: Great products. We bought Moen everything in our house from towel racks to robe hangers and I love them all. The brushed nickel gives off a nice sheen, but not as thumb-print prone than say just standard silver. They are sturdy and are a great size for holding large towels or even 2 smaller ones side by side. They are also relatively easy to install and my fiancé installed all of them within a day (we're talking about about 10 different pieces here).
customer_reviews.author: Florence Bauchau

customer_reviews.title: These racks are poor quality and the bar rattles inside the holder
customer_reviews.text: These racks are poor quality and the bar rattles inside the holder. Also, the instructions were unclear, making it difficult to hang. I would not recommend to a friend
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Go get one
customer_reviews.text: Super straight forward install. Good product with a nice finish
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: inexpensive but cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: These look ok for the price, but you have to be very accurate when installing or the bars will be a little too far apart and the pole will spin around when you place a towel on it. Can't re-drill all the holes once this is placed so do it right the first time. I installed 4 in my house and all of them were fine except one that I must have done more quickly, so just don't get sloppy when installing. They look nice and are inexpensive though so overall I would recommend these for people with a low budget.
customer_reviews.author: T Vas

customer_reviews.title: seems to work fine so far
customer_reviews.text: just installed it (was more difficult than it needed to be), but seems to be working ok so far
customer_reviews.author: DukeU

customer_reviews.title: Excellent: easy to install and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Nicely packaged, easy to install, and seems very sturdy. I used heavier-duty screw-in wall anchors with excellent results. Bought this to match towel bars purchased several years ago that are no longer stocked by the big-box stores.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain West Bob

customer_reviews.title: Ensure you have the small screwdriver to install this
customer_reviews.text: The description is not very clear, expect to have the proper tools (small screwdriver) to install this. If I had known this was required I would have purchased an item that didn't require extra tools/had the necessary tools to install this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good finish.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the Preston polished chrome set for a quick guest bath rehab. They look great.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Casteel

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Put up two of these today. End brackets are solid and heavier than I expected. Mounting hardware is good quality. Installation is easy with the full-sized paper template that is supplied. Looks great -- and costs less than the stuff I saw at the local hardware store. Overall, much better than I expected. Here's a tip -- put a small piece of electrical tape at each end of the bar before you insert into the brackets, and the bar won't rotate. Overall, I'm very satisfied with these. I'm not surprised they are a best seller in this category.
customer_reviews.author: LeftCoast

customer_reviews.title: Score one for the Home DIYer
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful chrome bar. Perfect for the bathroom we built in our basement.
customer_reviews.author: WFreels - Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finish is just as described
customer_reviews.text: The nickel finish is exactly what we wanted. Matches perfectly to the sink faucet.
customer_reviews.author: Amber G.

customer_reviews.title: Adds value and a high quality look to my recently renovated bathroom.  Very smart!
customer_reviews.text: Looks high quality but at an affordable price. Recently tiled and renovated my bathroom and wanted some nice fixtures to add value for when I sell my house. This bathroom towel bar in conjunction with the toilet paper holder in the same Moen series came together quite nicely. Kudos to Amazon for delivering the items quick and without damage.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: As Expected
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, as expected. Easy to assemble, and I used the template that came with it with no problems whatsoever with it. I did run into one tiny problem when trying to get the screws/anchors out, however. They are held in by a tiny screw, and although I have many screwdrivers (and different sizes at that), I didn't have one small enough for this. I had to pull out my inner MacGyver and improvise. I ended up using a sturdy nail file, and it worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: AliMarMillayde

customer_reviews.title: looks and works great
customer_reviews.text: been using this in our bathroom. Mounted per instructions and its holding well
customer_reviews.author: Brent H

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and price!
customer_reviews.text: These are nice quality, especially for the price! I bought 6 of them to install behind the bedroom doors for our guests to use. The installation template worked great and the towel bars are good quality and attractive.
customer_reviews.author: WhoAmI?

customer_reviews.title: Practical and useful
customer_reviews.text: The width is perfect for the towels and gives the bathroom a good look
customer_reviews.author: jUSTIN S.

customer_reviews.title: Okay towel bar, for people who expect less
customer_reviews.text: Okay for a towel bar. One of the two attachment points wasn't cast precisely, so it made for loose connections of the anchor screws. I don't even know if that made sense... In other words, two stars for this thing for making me trying to tighten it multiple times, times I could use on twitter to argue with dumb people.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Works well, looks good
customer_reviews.text: Installed using screwholes from previous mounts. Be careful when tightening set screws; they must be vertical to avoid cross-threading. Used masking tape around the outside edges of the rod where they meet the holders; keeps rod stationary.
customer_reviews.author: New User

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking and very affordable.
customer_reviews.text: I have very few options in buying towel bars and accessories in Hawaii, so I do a lot more online shopping. In researching prices, look and function, I know Moen carries well made items. I found this price unbeatable on any other web site. I am always pleased at the speed in receiving my orders from Amazon, and how well they are packaged. I was able to hang this towel bar in around 15 minutes. It looks really nice, and it matches well with the light fixture I purchased. Thanks Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, coordinates with older chrome/brushed nickel fittings
customer_reviews.text: I like brushed nickel -- this design is kind of retro but it looks nice in a vanilla bathroom. Would look strange in something more modern.
customer_reviews.author: Renard

customer_reviews.title: Durable and beautiful design
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased these for several homes. Excellent quality, finish and design.
customer_reviews.author: Internet Rose

customer_reviews.title: Durable, easily installed, pretty
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, durable, used in kids bathroom, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: Works well and better looking than the usual basic one.
customer_reviews.author: Harper

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking.
customer_reviews.text: Really like these smaller diameter towel bars. We bought the matching 18 inch bars, robe hook, and paper holder. They look really nice in our new bathroom. No problems with mounting except make sure you place them where you can get the included wrench into the small set screws and have room from an adjacent wall.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley A Larsen

customer_reviews.title: does not come with advertised tools
customer_reviews.text: seems like a really nice product. Better quality than competitors. However, i did not give it 5 stars because the promo video is completely wrong. It does not come with a map plan to know where to drill the holes, it does not come with any anchors and it does not come with the very tiny scew driver needed to take the brackets off the mounting area. Though the video is very educational... it should not provide false advertisement of the included tools.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

product_meta.title: Moen DN8424BN Preston Collection 24-Inch Bathroom Single Towel Bar, Brushed Nickel
product_meta.description:
Style:1 Pack| Color:Brushed NickelWith its timeless, low key design, the Moen Preston 24 Inch Bathroom Towel Bar adds a touch of understated style to your bathroom. The 24 inch bar offers ample space for hanging towels, washcloths, and other bathroom items. A stamped steel mounting bracket enhances durability, while the included mounting hardware and template make installation easy. The Moen Preston Towel Bar is available in a highly reflective chrome finish and a warm brushed nickel finish.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Moen's Brushed Nickel 24-inch Towel Bar provides a lightly brushed warm grey metallic look. Moen is dedicated to designing and delivering beautiful products that last a lifetime. Moen offers a diverse selection of kitchen faucets, kitchen sinks, bathroom faucets and accessories, and showering products. Moen products combine style and functionality with durability for a lifetime of customer satisfaction.
feature_bullets: WARM AND INVITING: Brushed Nickel finish provides a lightly brushed warm-grey metallic look
COORDINATING COLLECTION: Coordinates with other Moen bathroom accessories
FLEXIBLE PLACEMENT: For use in the bath as well as the kitchen for hanging towels and more
BUILT TO LAST: Backed by Moen's Limited Lifetime Warranty
